attributes.action: Recognise Serge Danot for his fabulous creation the "Magic Roundabout"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please do not consider this trivial. We the undersigned are sincere in the belief that despite having passed away nearly 20 years ago, Mr Danot should be recognised by the British people for his effort in creating and bringing "The Magic Roundabout" to UK TV audiences. This series despite being semi animated appealed to both young and old. This gentleman  did more for Entente-cordiale than any high ranking politician since its inception in 1904

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
